section.p: You are allowed to stay one night at the abbey. Recover 2 Stamina points if injured. ‘You must leave now,’ the nuns tell you at breakfast. ‘Only initiates may remain here among us.’

If you wish to become an initiate of Lacuna you must convince the nuns of your sincerity by
making a SANCTITY roll at Difficulty 12 .
(But you cannot try to become an initiate of Lacuna if you are already an initiate of another god.)
